name: Rhythm Own
description:
Play Demo on PC: Using key 1-4 for each color (files download below).

New type game: base on Travel Square, can playable on Android and make your charts on PC

View Debug log on Android or Window => Draw 1 circle on screen.

Join discord server for any question and get more Charts to play.

Link invite:  https://discord.gg/ecAfCf8

Game play and Editor:


Thanks Julie Maxwell for making the pretty background music!
Track: 招待 (Invitation) 
Website: http://www.juliemaxwell.com
Bandcamp: https://juliemaxwellspianomusic.bandcamp.com/

Thanks all for making icons used in the game!
